English:
All of the Seven have been crushed. This is
truly incredible.
Chinese: 這樣子，就把七大魔王全打敗了……你真是太厲害了呀。
German:
Alle Sieben wurden vernichtet. Das ist wahrlich
kaum zu glauben.

English:
You were strong enough! I... I knew it! Thank you.
Thank you! I-I should have had more faith in you.
Chinese:
你的力量居然那麼強……
不過，我還是有一點無法置信。
Korean:
너에게 그런 힘이 있었다니…
아직 약간, 조금밖에 믿기지 않지만
German:
Du warst stark genug! Ich ... Ich wusste es!
Danke! Ich hätte an dich glauben sollen.

English:
Does this mean Dianamon can finally come home?
Mirei, please...!
Chinese: 總之，這樣子……狄安娜獸就會回來了吧？
German:
Heißt das, dass Dianamon endlich nach Hause
kommen kann? Mirei, bitte ...!

English:
That is precisely what it means. Leave all this in
my hands.
Chinese: 沒錯，接下來就交給我吧。
German: Genau das heißt es. Überlass das nur mir.

English:
Did you obtain the Evidence of Sin from the last
of the Seven?
Chinese:
你有確實幫我從最後一隻七大魔王身上
回收「罪之證」嗎？
Korean:
7대 마왕, 최후의 한 체에게서도
확실히「죄의 증거」를 회수해 와 준 걸까?
German:
Hast du die Essenz der Sünde vom letzten der
Sieben eingesammelt?

English: Finally the new values can arise...
Chinese: 這樣子，就能創造出“新價值”了……
Korean: 이로써, "새로운 가치"를 만들어 낼 수 있어…
German: Jetzt können endlich neue Werte herrschen ...

English:
Oh, I must have said that out loud. You wish to
know of what I speak?
Chinese:
哎呀，你聽到了呢……
你想知道“新價值”是什麼嗎？
Korean:
어머, 듣고 있었구나…
"새로운 가치"가 뭔지, 알고 싶니?
German:
Oh, das habe ich wohl laut gesagt.
Du willst wissen, wovon ich rede?

English: Well, you have a right to the knowledge.
German: Nun, du hast ein Recht auf dieses Wissen.

English:
It is my fate, but it seems you are well ensnared
with me.
Chinese:
因為這是我的命運，
同時也是你命運的一部分。
Korean:
이건 내 운명인 동시에
네 운명의 일부이기도 하니까
German:
Es ist mein Schicksal, doch deines scheint damit
verwoben zu sein.

English:
Wait here. All will be prepared soon. And Dianamon
will return to you, Miss Sayo.
Chinese:
在準備好之前，請稍等一下。
到那個時候，狄安娜獸也會回來。
Korean:
준비가 될 때까지, 잠시 기다리고 있어
디아나몬도, 그때가 되면 돌아올 거야
German:
Warte hier. Bald wird alles bereit sein. Und
Dianamon wird zurückkehren, Fräulein Sayo.

Chinese: 我很期待“那個時候”的到來呢，呵呵。

English:
Hey, um... Mirei was acting kind of strange, don't
you think? I hope everything's all right.
Chinese:
喂、喂……米蕾小姐怎麼了……
總覺得……她樣子好像怪怪的？
Korean:
저, 저기… 미레이 씨, 왜 저러는 걸까…
뭔가… 상태가 이상하지 않아?
German:
He, ähm ... Mirei war ein bisschen komisch, oder?
Ich hoffe, es ist alles in Ordnung.
